TopicTitle: Have every key binding be remappable

Articles.Content: Says it all in the title, if you can press a key to do it then give the user the ability to remap that key in the options. With a nice GUI too
Yes, please. Very useful for those with non-standard keyboard layouts, laptop users without numpads, or those with controllers with many buttons.
You mean key mapping should be accessed from the game, not only from the main menu?

You mean key mapping should be accessed from the game, not only from the main menu?

This. I very distinctly remember all keys being remappable.

*snip*

EDIT :

There a lot there, quite a few in fact more than I remember but the ones I want to change are the keys you press to change the mousewheel function in the VAB to force the same behaviour the SPH and to change LSHIFT to be something else. I`d also like to change the default action for the mousewheel to be up/down in both editors.

There may be more but those are the ones that bother me personally.
